---
title: "return_list_of_deployments_on_s3"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(reactable)
library(reactablefmtr)
```

Pull in data

```{r}
uploaded <- read_csv(here("misc_files/files_uploaded_to_s3.txt"), col_names = F)
colnames(uploaded) <- "File_name"
```
Now extract column with Cam_SD, Year, Month of deployment

```{r}
uploaded <- uploaded |> mutate(
  Cam_SD = str_sub(File_name, 1, 10), 
)
decompose <- uploaded |> 
  str_split(File_name, "_")
  str_match(uploaded, File_name)
```
